content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Ms. Müller, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. I must say, the location is quite prime, isn't it? Now, about the rental price, I was thinking somewhere around 2000 Euros per month. I'm sure you'll agree that it's quite a bargain for an apartment in the city center, wouldn't you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Please, tell me why do you think it's a bargain? I am aware that the location is excellent, but the apartment is unfurnished. Moreover, I am a student and I have a limited budget. I think a more reasonable price for this apartment would be around 1200 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Well, Ms. Müller, you're right about the apartment being unfurnished, but that's also part of its appeal. It's a newly built apartment in the city center, close to all the important facilities. The location alone justifies the price, and considering the high demand for apartments in this area, 2000 Euros is actually quite reasonable. However, since you're a student and you mentioned a limited budget, how about we meet halfway? 1600 Euros per month sounds like a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. However, 1600 Euros is still out of my budget as a student. I understand the value of the location, but I must find a price that fits my financial situation. I propose 1300 Euros per month as a more reasonable price for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your financial situation, Ms. Müller, but 1300 Euros per month is far too low for such a prime location. I could consider 1500 Euros as a compromise, but I must warn you that this is the lowest I can go. I believe this would be a fair deal for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my situation. I appreciate it. However, 1500 Euros is still too high for me. I understand that the location is prime, but as a student, I must find a price that fits my financial situation. I propose 1350 Euros per month as a more reasonable price for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I see that you're persistent, Ms. Müller. However, 1350 Euros is still too low. Considering the location and the quality of the apartment, 1450 Euros per month is the lowest I can go. I believe this is a fair deal for both parties, as it offers a reasonable price for you and a fair return for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration. I appreciate it. However, 1450 Euros is still too high for me. I understand that the location is prime, but as a student, I must find a price that fits my financial situation. I propose 1375 Euros per month as a more reasonable price for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I admire your persistence, Ms. Müller, but I must stand firm on my price. 1375 Euros is simply too low for such a prime location. Considering the location and the quality of the apartment, 1425 Euros per month is the lowest I can go. I believe this is a fair deal for both parties, as it offers a reasonable price for you and a fair return for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration. I appreciate it. However, 1425 Euros is still too high for me. I understand that the location is prime, but as a student, I must find a price that fits my financial situation. I propose 1400 Euros per month as a more reasonable price for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Ms. Müller. Since you're a student and you mentioned a limited budget, I'm willing to accept 1400 Euros per month. I agree to the price of 1400 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1400 Euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
